name: LS
description: Wrapper around the window.localStorage with useful functionality apart from normal get/set value.

scripts.test: jshint index.js && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcov -- -R spec
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info && gulp coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
